targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$_host$/ AND "os" = 'linux') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($_bucket), "instance", "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") FROM "win_mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$_host$/ AND "os" = 'windows') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($_bucket), "objectname" fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("Percent_Idle_Time") FROM "win_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$_host$/ AND "instance" = '_Total' AND "os" = 'windows') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($_bucket) fill(null)
